review: Only 56% gave this item 5 stars I gave it one star. Here's why.None of the cute pictures show the thing installed. I installed it in an HDMI port, nothing happened. So as a last resort, I looked in the box for instructions. Along with those, I found a couple more pieces of hardware. There is an AC plug and a cable that attaches to it, and into a wall outlet. The other end of the cable attaches to the stick itself.NO WHERE DO THE PICTURES INDICATE THAT A CORD MUST GO FROM THIS STICK TO A WALL OUTLET.The problem is that many new flat screens are made to hang on the wall. To help expedite that, they build the HDMI ports parallel with the tv back, but inset. It was a major issue to get this plugged in, when the end of it had a cord attached. I made it, but barely.
author: SilverGhost

review: Bought this item as a gift for my mom. We had a problem with the remote immediately. It just wouldn't work. So we replaced the batteries. Then it worked for a couple days and stopped again. We tried replacing the batteries again. But this time it did no good. The remote is dead.I personally have a different model roku streaming stick and it works fine (other than overheating sometimes and freezing after long periods of use).  But this 3500R isn't worth buying. VERY cheaply made. Don't waste your money.
